data.text: @MichaelBennet Your legacy will be forever tarnished by your steadfast monetary and political support for Israel as it slowly and methodically eradicates the entire native population of Palestine. The murder of 20k+ Palestinian children was never worth a “child tax credit.”

@MichaelBennet Pass the SAVE act, thee ONLY read anyone would not vote for it admits they need illegals to vote for them

Our rights are restricted and we're drowning in fees

@MichaelBennet So what did you tell the people in Arvada?  I'm going to guess it wasn't true.  Look no farther than the State Legislature for choking out taxpayers.
@MichaelBennet So, what’s driving costs up?  You can’t say it without sharing with us.

@MichaelBennet Well East Coast Mike I can tell you what is contributing to the High Cost of Living or in political terms unaffordability. First of all increasing the money supply created more than 20% inflation.All the taxes including the ones called fees from the state. Increase property taxes
